name: igraweb_client
description: A JavaScript Client for loading and updating data on the Igraweb Content API.

scripts.build: (rm -r dist) && (babel source --presets babel-preset-es2015 --plugins transform-object-assign --out-dir dist) && (sass source/styles/app.sass dist/igraweb.css) && (cp -r ./source/fonts ./dist)

author: jphager2, bendis, masak
